meaningMnemonic: Your pudding <kanji>congeal</kanji>ed and is all <kanji>hard</kanji>. How on earth did it <vocabulary>solidify</vocabulary> like this? It shouldn't <vocabulary>freeze</vocabulary> unless you put it in the freezer. Unless, did you? Oh...
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
